snippet: The winning jockey of this year’s Kentucky Derby, Joel Rosario, won another stakes race at Belmont Park, guiding Miss Valentine to victory in the No Reason.
abstract: Joel Rosario, winning jockey at Kentucky Derby, wins another stakes race at Belmont Park, riding horse Miss Valentine.
lead_paragraph: The winning jockey of this year’s Kentucky Derby, Joel Rosario, won another stakes race at Belmont Park, guiding Miss Valentine to victory in the No Reason.
